inference:
The radius of the semicircle is 1, so the distance from $C$ to the center of the semicircle is $1$. The distance from $C$ to $E$ is the hypotenuse of a right triangle with legs of length 1 and 1, so the length of $\overline{CE}$ is $\sqrt{1^2+1^2}=\sqrt{2}$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{\sqrt{2}}$. I hope it is correct.
